original_query: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM keyword AS k, movie_info AS mi, movie_keyword AS mk, title AS t WHERE k.keyword LIKE '%sequel%' AND mi.info IN ('Bulgaria') AND t.production_year > 2010 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM title AS title WHERE title.production_year > 2010
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM movie_keyword AS movie_keyword
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM keyword AS keyword WHERE keyword.keyword LIKE '%sequel%'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E1 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E3.keyword_id=E1.id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM movie_info AS movie_info WHERE movie_info.info = 'Bulgaria'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E1.movie_id=E2.movie_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(title) AS MOVIE_TITLE FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E1E2 WHERE E4.id=E3E1E2.movie_id)
